enum: 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball

productName.title: Product Name
productName.description: Alphanumeric, 199 characters - Title of the product to be displayed on the Item Page. Your title should ideally be under 90 Characters, Maximum 100 Characters.  Anything over 90 characters will negatively impact your Search Engine Optimization (SEO). Example: Pompeii3 1/4 Carat Genuine Diamond Stud Earrings in 14k White Gold (I2-I3 Clarity, IJ Color)
examples: Pompeii3 1/4 Carat Genuine Diamond Stud Earrings in 14k White Gold (I2-I3 Clarity, IJ Color)

brand.title: Brand Name
brand.description: Alphanumeric, 60 characters - The name provided by the brand owner that is intended to be recognized by the consumer as represented on the product. If item does not have a brand, use "Unbranded".  This should be the brand ONLY, not brand + product line. Make sure brand name is spelled, punctuated & capitalized properly according to the brand itself. Example: Brilliance Fine Jewelry;Duet;Imperial;Jacmel Jewelry;Kate Spade;Miabella;PalmBeach Jewelry;Pandora;Swarovski;Tangelo;Terra & Sky

shortDescription.title: Site Description
shortDescription.description: Alphanumeric, 100000 characters - Overview of the key selling points of the item, marketing content, and highlights in paragraph form. For SEO purposes, repeat the product name and relevant keywords here. Example: These Created Turquoise and Marcasite Sterling Silver Heart Drop Earrings are the perfect accent for your boho-chic ensembles. The heart-shaped drop design features created turquoise and marcasite inset with studded designs inside. Secure them in your ears with the fishhook back that makes them super-easy to wear. Crafted in sterling silver, these versatile earrings can be worn in both casual and dressy situations and add a pop of color to your basic ensembles. Wear them with a crop top and cutoff shorts for music festivals or a sundress and blazer when you're going to work.;Check out this breathtakingly beautiful diamond flower ring from Stackable Expressions. It is crafted from sleek sterling silver with quality rhodium plating and gorgeous ruthenium plating. This elegant, 2.25-millimeter ring features a stunning, .11 ct. t.w. diamond accent. This timeless flower ring will be your favorite accessory for years to come. Available in whole sizes five, six, seven, eight, nine and 10. Express yourself in a unique and fun way with the new Stackable Expressions Collection. Choose from hundreds of rings that you can mix, match and stack together, allowing you to switch up your style in an instant. Stackable Expressions offers jewelry that is crafted from sterling silver, colorfully enameled, 14kt gold-plated, adorned with stunning diamonds and/or gemstones and more. The possibilities are endless with this incredible assortment of stackable jewelry.
examples: These Created Turquoise and Marcasite Sterling Silver Heart Drop Earrings are the perfect accent for your boho-chic ensembles. The heart-shaped drop design features created turquoise and marcasite inset with studded designs inside. Secure them in your ears with the fishhook back that makes them super-easy to wear. Crafted in sterling silver, these versatile earrings can be worn in both casual and dressy situations and add a pop of color to your basic ensembles. Wear them with a crop top and cutoff shorts for music festivals or a sundress and blazer when you're going to work.

Check out this breathtakingly beautiful diamond flower ring from Stackable Expressions. It is crafted from sleek sterling silver with quality rhodium plating and gorgeous ruthenium plating. This elegant, 2.25-millimeter ring features a stunning, .11 ct. t.w. diamond accent. This timeless flower ring will be your favorite accessory for years to come. Available in whole sizes five, six, seven, eight, nine and 10. Express yourself in a unique and fun way with the new Stackable Expressions Collection. Choose from hundreds of rings that you can mix, match and stack together, allowing you to switch up your style in an instant. Stackable Expressions offers jewelry that is crafted from sterling silver, colorfully enameled, 14kt gold-plated, adorned with stunning diamonds and/or gemstones and more. The possibilities are endless with this incredible assortment of stackable jewelry.
shortDescription.comments: @minimumWordCount=70;@recommendedWordCount=100;@group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.description: Alphanumeric, 10000 characters - Key features will appear as bulleted text on the item page and in search results. Key features help the user understand the benefits of the product with a simple and clean format.  Example: •;1 ct. t.w. diamond necklace;•;Diamond Color Rating: G-H;•;Diamond Clarity: I3;•;Diamond shape: round;•;Set in sterling silver;•;Approx. length: 18"";•;Heart pendant approx. 25mm;•;High polish finish;•;Lobster clasp; Round cable chain;•;Come in a gift box with a jewelry polishing cloth";"•;Main Stone: 1 Round Faceted Cut Cubic Zirconia, 3.50 carats, 9.5 mm x 9.5 mm;•;6 Round Faceted Cut Cubic Zirconias, .90 carat total weight, 3.5 mm x 3.5 mm;•;20 Round Faceted Cut Cubic Zirconias, .26 carat total weight, 1.4 mm x 1.4 mm;•;Platinum-Plated Sterling Silver;•;Contains 6.00 grams of Sterling Silver;•;Shank Width: 9.0 mm wide;•;Ring Dimensions: 20 mm wide x 11 mm long x 8 mm high, Ring Dimensions: 20 mm wide x 14 mm long x 4 mm high;•;Includes gift box and drawstring pouch
examples: Come in a gift box with a jewelry polishing cloth"
Main Stone: 1 Round Faceted Cut Cubic Zirconia, 3.50 carats, 9.5 mm x 9.5 mm
6 Round Faceted Cut Cubic Zirconias, .90 carat total weight, 3.5 mm x 3.5 mm
20 Round Faceted Cut Cubic Zirconias, .26 carat total weight, 1.4 mm x 1.4 mm
Ring Dimensions: 20 mm wide x 11 mm long x 8 mm high, Ring Dimensions: 20 mm wide x 14 mm long x 4 mm high
Includes gift box and drawstring pouch
keyFeatures.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

mainImageUrl.title: Main Image URL
mainImageUrl.description:
URL, 2500 characters - Main image of the item. File Format: JPEG (.jpg). Recommended Pixel Dimensions: 2200px x 2200px. Minimum Pixel Dimensions for Zoom 1500px x 1500px. Resolution: 300 ppi. Maximum file size: 5MB. Aspect Ratio: 1:1 (Square). Recommended File Naming: GTIN-14 digit
Image URLs should end in an image file type (.jpg) to follow best practices. They must link to a public image file that loads as an image
mainImageUrl.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

countPerPack.title: Count Per Pack
countPerPack.description: Number, 10 characters - The number of identical items inside each individual package given by the "Multipack Quantity" attribute. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Count Per Pack" of 50. (3) A 6-pack of soda labeled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Count Per Pack" of 1. (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Count Per Pack" of 6. (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Count Per Pack" of 1. Example: 1;2;10;50
countPerPack.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

count.title: Total Count
count.description: Number, 17 characters - The total number of identical items in the package or box; a result of the multiplication of Multipack Quantity by Count Per Pack. Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 50. (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Total Count" of 100. (3) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Total Count" of 1. Example: 1;50;100
count.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

multipackQuantity.title: Multipack Quantity
multipackQuantity.description: Number, 4 characters - The number of identical, individually packaged-for-sale items. If an item does not contain other items, does not contain identical items, or if the items contained within cannot be sold individually, the value for this attribute should be"1." Examples: (1) A single bottle of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of"1." (2) A package containing two identical bottles of 50 pills has a "Multipack Quantity" of 2. (3) A 6-pack of soda labelled for individual sale connected by plastic rings has a "Multipack Quantity" of"6." (4) A 6-pack of soda in a box whose cans are not marked for individual sale has a "Multipack Quantity" of"1." (5) A gift basket of 5 different items has a "Multipack Quantity" of"1." Example: 1;2;4;6
multipackQuantity.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

isProp65WarningRequired.title: Is Prop 65 Warning Required
isProp65WarningRequired.description: Closed List - Selecting "Yes" indicates the product requires California's Proposition 65 special warning. Proposition 65 entitles California consumers to special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to the state of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm if certain criteria are met (such as quantity of chemical contained in the product). See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 for more information.
isProp65WarningRequired.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

ageGroup.title: Age Group
ageGroup.description: Closed List - A general grouping of ages into commonly used demographic labels. • Infant, 0-1 • Toddler, 1-3 • Child, 4-10 • Tween, 11-13 • Teen, 14-17 • Adult, 18-64 • Senior, 65+
ageGroup.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

color.title: Color
color.description: Alphanumeric, 600 characters - Color refers to the actual color defined by the manufacturer. For Example, an item may be gray and black (which are used in the Color Category attribute) but the manufacturer calls the color Space Gray. Example: Jet Black;Black;Blue;Aqua;Lime Green;Silver;Black/Red
color.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

colorCategory.title: Color Category
colorCategory.description:
Closed List - Select the color from a short list that best describes the general color(s) of the item. This improves searchability as it allows customers to view items by color from the left navigation when they perform a search.

Please list all colors for the item. If the item has more than one color, please select Multi-color in addition to primary colors. Don’t list more than the three main colors.
colorCategory.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Closed List - This refers to the state of an item, indicating its level of wear, prior use (if any), appearance, and overall quality. Availability of condition types may vary by product/category as well as by Seller eligibility per program. For more details, review this Help article: https://sellerhelp.walmart.com/seller/s/guide?language=en_US&article=000011205.
condition.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

backFinding.title: Earring Back
backFinding.description: Closed List - Kind of hardware used in the "back" of the jewelry, as in the earring back that helps to fasten the earring to the ear. This may be, for example, the earring finding or jewelry backing style.
backFinding.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

earringStyle.title: Earring Style
earringStyle.description: Closed List - Style of earring, as represented by fashion or form.
earringStyle.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

jewelryStyle.title: Fine or Fashion
jewelryStyle.description: Closed List - Fine jewelry indicates a high-quality of material, workmanship, and durability. Fashion (sometimes called "costume" or "cosmetic") jewelry is made from inexpensive materials, is usually mass-produced, and has a generally lower level of quality.
jewelryStyle.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

gemstone.title: Gemstone Type
gemstone.description: Closed List - The stone trade name (i.e., amethyst, not purple quartz). Note that this includes pearls as well, even though not technically a "stone." For accent stones, use "Accent Stone Type." If the stone is not in the list, use "Other."
gemstone.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: Closed List - Indicates whether this item is meant for a particular gender or meant to be gender-agnostic (unisex).
gender.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

has_written_warranty.title: Has Written Warranty
has_written_warranty.description: Closed List - Indicates an item has written warranty documentation included on the product label, inside the product packaging, or a website URL or PDF available for customer review.
has_written_warranty.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

material.title: Material
material.description: Alphanumeric, 1000 characters - The main material(s) in the product. Example: Faux Leather;Leather;Metal;Plastic;Wood
material.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

metal.title: Metal Type
metal.description: Closed List - For items made primarily of metal, or where the metal component plays an important part in the makeup of the item and purchasing decision.
metal.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

productNetContentMeasure.title: Measure
productNetContentMeasure.description:
Decimal, 16 characters - The numeric net content portion that appears on an item. 

Please Note: If your item includes multiple items with the same UOM, add them together to get the total measurement. If the item is a set with multiple items that do not share the same UOM, list as 1 Each. Example: 1;12;32

productNetContentUnit.title: Unit
productNetContentUnit.description:
Closed List - The unit of measure as defined on the product labeling. For example, a gallon of milk has 128 Fluid Ounces: Measure = 128 and Units = Fluid Ounces.

Please Note: If your item includes multiple items with the same UOM, add them together to get the total measurement. If the item is a set with multiple items that do not share the same UOM, list as 1 Each.

netContent.title: Net Content
netContent.description:
The quantity (or quantities) of the product contained in the package along with its unit of measure typically printed on the label for the country or market where the product is sold.  For example, a gallon of milk has 128 Fluid Ounces: Measure = 128 and Units = Fluid Ounces. 

Please Note: If your item includes multiple items with the same UOM, add them together to get the total measurement. If the item is a set with multiple items that do not share the same UOM, list as 1 Each.
netContent.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

smallPartsWarnings.title: Small Parts Warning Code

enum: 1 - Choking hazard is a small ball

smallPartsWarnings.description: Closed List - To determine if any choking warnings are applicable, check current product packaging for choking warning message(s). Please indicate the warning number (0-6). 0- No warning applicable; 1- Choking hazard is a small ball; 2- Choking hazard contains small ball; 3- Choking hazard contains small parts; 4- Choking hazard balloon; 5- Choking hazard is a marble; 6- Choking hazard contains a marble.
smallPartsWarnings.comments: @group=Required for the item to be visible on Walmart website

productSecondaryImageURL.title: Additional Image URL
productSecondaryImageURL.description:
URL, 2500 characters - Secondary images of the item. File Format: JPEG (.jpg). Recommended Pixel Dimensions: 2200px x 2200px. Minimum Pixel Dimensions for Zoom 1500px x 1500px. Resolution: 300 ppi. Maximum file size: 5MB. Aspect Ratio: 1:1 (Square). Recommended File Naming: GTIN-14 digit
Image URLs should end in an image file type (.jpg) to follow best practices. They must link to a public image file that loads as an image
productSecondaryImageURL.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The depth of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page as length of the product. Example: 5;10;16;22

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The depth of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page as length of the product.

assembledProductLength.title: Assembled Product Depth
assembledProductLength.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The depth of the fully assembled product. NOTE: This information is shown on the item page as length of the product. Example: 5;10;16;22
assembledProductLength.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The height of the fully assembled product.  Example: 5;10;16;22

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The height of the fully assembled product.

assembledProductHeight.title: Assembled Product Height
assembledProductHeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The height of the fully assembled product.  Example: 5;10;16;22
assembledProductHeight.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The weight of the fully assembled product.  Example: 1.75;5;12;32

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The weight of the fully assembled product.

assembledProductWeight.title: Assembled Product Weight
assembledProductWeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The weight of the fully assembled product.  Example: 1.75;5;12;32
assembledProductWeight.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The width of the fully assembled product.  Example: 5;10;16;22

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The width of the fully assembled product.

assembledProductWidth.title: Assembled Product Width
assembledProductWidth.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The width of the fully assembled product.  Example: 5;10;16;22
assembledProductWidth.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

birthstone.title: Birthstone Month
birthstone.description: Closed List - Name of month associated with this gemstone as a birthstone.
birthstone.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

globalBrandLicense.title: Brand License
globalBrandLicense.description: Alphanumeric, 4000 characters - A brand name that is not owned by the product brand, but is licensed for the particular product. (Often character and media tie-ins and promotions.) It can also be another brand or a celebrity. Example: Michael Jordan;Harley Davidson;Life is Good;Signature;EV1;Disney
globalBrandLicense.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

prop65WarningText.title: California Prop 65 Warning Text
prop65WarningText.description: Alphanumeric, 5000 characters - This is a particular statement legally required by the State of California for certain products to warn consumers about potential health dangers. See the portions of the California Health and Safety Code related to Proposition 65 to see what products require labels and to verify the text of your warning label. If no warning please enter the value,"None". Example: For Example: This product can expose you to chemicals including [name of one or more chemicals], which is [are] known to the State of California to cause [list associated harm(s) e.g. cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm, etc].
examples: For Example: This product can expose you to chemicals including [name of one or more chemicals], which is [are] known to the State of California to cause [list associated harm(s) e.g. cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm, etc].
prop65WarningText.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

certifyingAgent.title: Certifying Agent
certifyingAgent.description: Alphanumeric, 4000 characters - Certifying agency for certification. Example: Oregon Tilth; GOTS
certifyingAgent.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

character.title: Character
character.description: Alphanumeric, 50 characters - A person or entity portrayed in print or visual media. A character might be a fictional personality or an actual living person. Example: Wonder Woman;Power Rangers;Minnie Mouse;Jojo Siwa;Hello Kitty;Dora the Explorer;Batman
character.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

character_group.title: Character Group
character_group.description: Alphanumeric, 50 characters - Character group name or fictional team name as they appear in a media product. Example: X-Men;Transformers;The Lion King;My Little Pony;Disney Inside Out;Avengers
character_group.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

collection.title: Collection
collection.description: Alphanumeric, 100 characters - A collection is a particular group of items that have the same visual style, made by the same brand. In the fashion industry a collection is defined by the items that a designer puts together for each season Example: Bela Collection;Bold Collection;Heritage Collection;Luno Collection;Sapphire Collection;Series 800 Collection;Ultra Slim Collection
collection.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

designer.title: Designer
designer.description: Alphanumeric, 400 characters - Name of the person who planned the form, look, or workings of the product to be made or built. Example: Christian Louboutin;Jimmy Choo;Kenneth Cole;Salvatore Ferragamo;Steve Madden
designer.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

diamondClarity.title: Diamond Clarity
diamondClarity.description: Closed List - Diamond clarity is a quality of diamonds relating to the existence and visual appearance of internal characteristics of a diamond called inclusions, and surface defects called blemishes.
diamondClarity.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

diamondColor.title: Diamond Color
diamondColor.description: Closed List - Diamond color refers to the GIA grades and descriptions for a diamond's lack of color, grading the whiteness of a diamond.
diamondColor.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

diamondCut.title: Diamond Cut
diamondCut.description: Closed List - The style or design followed when cutting a diamond. This does not refer to the shape of the diamond, but the pattern of the cut itself.
diamondCut.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

diamond_cut_grade.title: Diamond Cut Grade
diamond_cut_grade.description: Closed List - GIA evaluation of how successfully a diamond interacts with light to create desirable visual effects such as: brightness, fire, and scintillation.  GIA's diamond cut grade also includes a diamond's weight relative to its diameter, its girdle thickness, the symmetry of its facet arrangement, and the quality of polish on those facets.
diamond_cut_grade.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

earringFeature.title: Earring Feature
earringFeature.description: Closed List - Features distinct to earring jewelry.
earringFeature.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

frameColorConfiguration.title: Frame Color Configuration
frameColorConfiguration.description: Alphanumeric, 40 characters - Describes the frame color configurations available through the third party partner. This is not a Walmart variant.  Example: Black; Brown; Silver
frameColorConfiguration.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

frontEndPhotoPartner.title: Front End Photo Partner
frontEndPhotoPartner.description: Closed List - Name of the partner that hosts the website or application where customers will find the Photo item
frontEndPhotoPartner.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

gemstoneClarity.title: Gemstone Clarity
gemstoneClarity.description: Closed List - Note that while the clarity rating scale (VVS, VS, etc.) is the same for colored gems as it is for diamonds, the meaning is different: Rating definitions vary based on the type of colored gem. Please refer to the specific ratings definitions for Type 1, Type 2, or Type 3 gems.
gemstoneClarity.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

gemstoneColor.title: Gemstone Color
gemstoneColor.description: Alphanumeric, 100 characters - The color of the gemstone including factors of hue, tone and saturation. Expressed as a color grade, or descriptors (light rose).  Example: Black;Blue;Blue-green;Blue-violet;Brown;Color-changing;Colorless;Faint-color;Fancy-color;Green;Green-blue;Green-yellow;Multiple-colors;Near-colorless;Orange;Orange-red;Orange-yellow;Pink;Red;Red-orange;Red-violet;Violet;Violet-blue;Violet-red;White;Yellow;Yellow-green;Yellow-orange"Black;Blue;Blue-green;Blue-violet;Brown;Color-changing;Colorless;Faint-color;Fancy-color;Green;Green-blue;Green-yellow;Multiple-colors;Near-colorless;Orange;Orange-red;Orange-yellow;Pink;Red;Red-orange;Red-violet;Violet;Violet-blue;Violet-red;White;Yellow;Yellow-green;Yellow-orange
gemstoneColor.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

gemstoneCut.title: Gemstone Cut
gemstoneCut.description: Closed List - Type of gemstone cut, as distinct from shape
gemstoneCut.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

inscription.title: Inscription
inscription.description: Alphanumeric, 1000 characters - If the item is engraved with an inscription, put the inscription text here. Example: Mom; World's Best Grandma; Best Friends Forever; I Love You
inscription.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

items_included.title: Items Included
items_included.description: Alphanumeric, 200 characters - Notes what items are sold with an item and part of a set. Example: Ring;Necklace;Bracelet
items_included.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

jewelry_occasion.title: Jewelry Occasion
jewelry_occasion.description: Closed List - An specific occasion which the jewelry piece may be represented for. The occasion typically represents as a token for a specific milestone or celebration.
jewelry_occasion.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

jewelrySetting.title: Jewelry Setting
jewelrySetting.description: Closed List - Method or style in which stones are attached to a piece of jewelry. Can apply to all types of jewelry including pins, earrings, and rings. Important factor to jewelry selection, especially rings. Selection involves trade offs between appearance/exposure of the gem, and security
jewelrySetting.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 17 characters - Measure of the purity or fineness of metal, expressed in Karats (parts per 24)  Example: 10; 14; 18; 22; 24

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - Measure of the purity or fineness of metal, expressed in Karats (parts per 24)

metalPurity.title: Karats
metalPurity.description: Decimal, 17 characters - Measure of the purity or fineness of metal, expressed in Karats (parts per 24)  Example: 10; 14; 18; 22; 24
metalPurity.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer Name
manufacturer.description:
Alphanumeric, 60 characters - The name of the manufacturer.

 Example: Procter & Gamble; Apple; Sony; General Motors; Yamaha
manufacturer.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

manufacturerPartNumber.title: Manufacturer Part Number
manufacturerPartNumber.description: Alphanumeric, 60 characters - MPN uniquely identifies the product to its manufacturer. For many products this will be identical to the model number. Some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching. Example: 5061025; TSR-1002; 4-40-3/4-pan-phil
manufacturerPartNumber.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

maximumOrderQuantity.title: Maximum Order Quantity
maximumOrderQuantity.description: Number, 17 characters - The maximum number of items a customer can order.  This maximum limit defines the quantity tiers for Walmart Photo products. Example: 20;100;1000
maximumOrderQuantity.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

metalStamp.title: Metal Stamp
metalStamp.description: Closed List - Most jewelry items made of precious metal are stamped with information about the purity level of the metal content. Generally the stamp is placed in an inconspicuous place on the item so it does not detract from the design. Stamps will usually be located on the inside of the band on a ring, on the post or basket setting on a pair of earrings, on the bail (the part that the chain slides through) on a pendant, and on the connecting ring or the clasp on a necklace or bracelet. All jewelry stamps adhere to strict guidelines set by the Federal Trade Commission.
metalStamp.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

minimumOrderQuantity.title: Minimum Order Quantity
minimumOrderQuantity.description: Number, 17 characters - The minimum number of items a customer can order.  This minimum limit defines the quantity tiers for Walmart Photo products. Example: 1;5;20
minimumOrderQuantity.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

modelNumber.title: Model Number
modelNumber.description: Alphanumeric, 60 characters - Model numbers allow manufacturers to keep track of each hardware device and identify or replace the proper part when needed. Model numbers are often found on the bottom, back, or side of a product. Having this information allows customers to search for items on the site and informs product matching. Example: G62-465DX; MFP00112BBQN
modelNumber.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

netContentStatement.title: Net Content Statement
netContentStatement.description: Alphanumeric, 500 characters - Complete product net content statement, as it appears on product packaging. Example: 6 - 5.3 OZ (150g) CUPS;1.98 Lb (900g)
netContentStatement.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

number_of_diamonds.title: Number of Diamonds
number_of_diamonds.description: Number, 5 characters - The total number of Diamonds on the item. Example: 1; 6
number_of_diamonds.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

numberOfGemstones.title: Number of Gemstones
numberOfGemstones.description: Number, 10 characters - Number of gemstones featured in a piece of jewelry. Example: 3; 1
numberOfGemstones.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

numberOfPearls.title: Number of Pearls
numberOfPearls.description: Number, 7 characters - A count of individual pearls on a single item.
numberOfPearls.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

pieceCount.title: Number of Pieces
pieceCount.description: Number, 17 characters - The number of small pieces, slices, or different items within the product. Piece Count applies to things such as puzzles, building block sets, and products that contain multiple different items (such as tool sets, dinnerware sets, gift baskets, art sets, makeup kits, or shaving kits.) Examples: A gift basket of 5 different items has a “Piece Count” of 5.; A 105-Piece Socket Wrench set has a "Piece Count" of 105.; A 500-piece puzzle has a “Piece Count” of 500. Example: 5;105;500
pieceCount.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

number_of_prongs.title: Number of Prongs
number_of_prongs.description: Number, 17 characters - More accurately indicates the total number of prongs the jewelry items has. This is required if the jewelry setting is equal = to Prong; Shard Prongs.  Example: 1;2;3;4;5
number_of_prongs.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

photoPaperFinishConfiguration.title: Paper Finish Configuration
photoPaperFinishConfiguration.description: Closed List - Names of paper configurations that are available for third party partners. These are not Walmart variants, this information is passed through to the third-party partner.
photoPaperFinishConfiguration.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: Alphanumeric, 400 characters - Decorative design or visual ornamentation, often with a thematic, recurring motif. Example: Animal Print;Floral;Geometric;Plaid;Polka Dot;Rainbow;Striped
pattern.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

pearlBodyColor.title: Pearl Body Color
pearlBodyColor.description: Alphanumeric, 4000 characters - The color of the pearl's body, vs. the overtone. Example: Black;Cream;Dyed-Blue;Lavender
pearlBodyColor.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

pearlLustre.title: Pearl Lustre
pearlLustre.description: Closed List - Measure of the quality and quantity of light that reflects off a pearl.
pearlLustre.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Thickness of the nacre, or iridescent layers which are produced by the mollusk to coat the nucleus of the pearl. Example: .25;.5

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - Thickness of the nacre, or iridescent layers which are produced by the mollusk to coat the nucleus of the pearl.

pearlNacreThickness.title: Pearl Nacre Thickness
pearlNacreThickness.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Thickness of the nacre, or iridescent layers which are produced by the mollusk to coat the nucleus of the pearl. Example: .25;.5
pearlNacreThickness.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

pearlShape.title: Pearl Shape
pearlShape.description: Closed List - The shape of the pearl, defined in part by how regular and smooth the surface of the pearl is.
pearlShape.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

pearlStringingMethod.title: Pearl Stringing Method
pearlStringingMethod.description: Closed List - Describes the knotting method and material used in constructing the string of pearls.
pearlStringingMethod.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

pearlSurfaceBlemishes.title: Pearl Surface Blemishes
pearlSurfaceBlemishes.description: Closed List - Evaluation of pearls based on the blemishes or irregularities in the pearl’s surface, based on size, number, nature, location, visibility and type of surface characteristics. Values range from Clean to Heavily Spotted.
pearlSurfaceBlemishes.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

pearlType.title: Pearl Type
pearlType.description: Closed List - Describes the method for growing pearls and information about the origin of the pearl.
pearlType.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

pearlUniformity.title: Pearl Uniformity
pearlUniformity.description: Closed List - Describes how well the individual pearls have been matched within a piece of pearl jewelry. Selection factor for quality and appearance, typically applied to pearl-strand necklaces. Values range from Excellent to Poor, depending on the degree of noticeable variations.
pearlUniformity.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

personalRelationship.title: Personal Relationship
personalRelationship.description: Closed List - Descriptive terms for the roles people have in each other's lives, commonly centered on family or romance.
personalRelationship.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

photoAccessoryItemSku.title: Photo Accessory Item SKU
photoAccessoryItemSku.description: Alphanumeric, 50 characters - This is the identifier (SKU) that is collected from the Vendor to handle the accessory items (e.g. extra book pages, card envelopes). Example: WJ_CW4152615213-9
photoAccessoryItemSku.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

photoConfigurationAttributeNames.title: Photo Configuration Attribute Names
photoConfigurationAttributeNames.description: Closed List - Designate all attributes for which the item has configurations.
photoConfigurationAttributeNames.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

photoItemStoreUpc.title: Photo Item Store WUPC
photoItemStoreUpc.description: Alphanumeric, 15 characters - The Walmart UPC for a Walmart Store item that is equivalent to the Walmart.com photo item Example: 648127739405
photoItemStoreUpc.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

photoOrderQuantityTier.title: Photo Order Quantity Tier
photoOrderQuantityTier.description: Number, 17 characters - Merchant-defined quantity tiers related to delivery method and most commonly used for photo prints. Example: 1; 2
photoOrderQuantityTier.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Measure of the weight (mass) of gemstones and pearls. One carat (ct) is equal to 200 mg. Example: 3.5 ct

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - Measure of the weight (mass) of gemstones and pearls. One carat (ct) is equal to 200 mg.

carats.title: Primary Stone Weight - Carats
carats.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Measure of the weight (mass) of gemstones and pearls. One carat (ct) is equal to 200 mg. Example: 3.5 ct
carats.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

productLine.title: Product Line
productLine.description: Alphanumeric, 400 characters - Product lines exist as a sub-structure of brands and, frequently, as a super-structure of models.
productLine.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

recycledMaterialContent.title: Recycled Material Content

percentageOfRecycledMaterial.title: Percentage of Recycled Material
percentageOfRecycledMaterial.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Corresponding percentage of the recycled material used to create the item. Used in conjunction with Recycled Material attribute. Example: 30;40

recycledMaterial.title: Recycled Material
recycledMaterial.description: Alphanumeric, 4000 characters - Type of recycled material used to create the item. Example: Bamboo; Cotton; Glass; Plastic

recycledMaterialContent.description: If item contains reused/recycled material, the percentage of all recycled material used to produce the item. This can also include specific material composition; cushions made from 30% recycled cotton fabric. Used to highlight sustainability to the customer. Example: 100% Cotton; 30% Bamboo
recycledMaterialContent.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

shape.title: Shape
shape.description: Alphanumeric, 200 characters - The physical shape of the item.  Example: Angel;Angled;Asymmetrical;Bolster;Bone;Bowl;Box;Butterfly;Circle;Cone;Cross;Cube;Cup;Curved;D-Shape;Diamond;Elliptical;Elongated;Fish;Flat;Flower;Free Form;Geometric;Heart;Hexagon;Kidney;L-Shape;Leaf;Moon;Mummy;Musical Note;Octagon;Oval;Palm;Pear;Pendant;Pentagon;Pie Chart;Pumpkin;Rectangle;Ring;Round;Rounded Triangle;Runner;Saucer;Semi-Rectangle;Semicircle;Slanted;Snowflake;Snowman;Spiral;Square;Star;Straight;Strawberry;Sunburst;Teardrop;Tree;Triangle;U-Shape;V-Shape
shape.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Diameter of each pearl in millimeters. Example: 12;5

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - Diameter of each pearl in millimeters.

sizePerPearl.title: Size Per Pearl
sizePerPearl.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Diameter of each pearl in millimeters. Example: 12;5
sizePerPearl.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

sportsLeague.title: Sports League
sportsLeague.description: Alphanumeric, 100 characters - If your item has any association with a specific sports league, enter the league name. Abbreviations are fine. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop. Example: NFL;WWE;MLB;NBA;NASCAR;USA Archery
sportsLeague.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

sportsTeam.title: Sports Team
sportsTeam.description: Alphanumeric, 200 characters - If your item has any association with a specific sports team, enter the team name. NOTE: This attribute flags an item for inclusion in the online fan shop. Example: San Jose Earthquakes;San Jose Sharks;Golden State Warriors;Las Vegas Raiders;San Francisco 49ers;San Francisco Giants;Stanford Cardinal;Oakland Athletics
sportsTeam.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

stoneCreationMethod.title: Stone Creation Method
stoneCreationMethod.description: Closed List - Whether the stone was created by nature or humans. If a stone is identified as natural, this means that it has not been treated, enhanced, or altered. If a stone is identified as stimulated, this means that it was created in a laboratory. Lab-created stones may also be referred to as: synthetic;” artificial;man-made;lab-grown.
stoneCreationMethod.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

stoneCulet.title: Stone Culet
stoneCulet.description: Closed List - The culet (pronounced cue-let) is the small area at the bottom of a diamond's pavilion. The culet can be a point or a very small facet sitting parallel to the table.
stoneCulet.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Stone depth percentage is calculated by the following formula: depth (measured from the top of the table to the culet) / width (girdle diameter).  Example: 5.5;2.3

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - Stone depth percentage is calculated by the following formula: depth (measured from the top of the table to the culet) / width (girdle diameter).

stoneDepthPercentage.title: Stone Depth Percentage
stoneDepthPercentage.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Stone depth percentage is calculated by the following formula: depth (measured from the top of the table to the culet) / width (girdle diameter).  Example: 5.5;2.3
stoneDepthPercentage.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

stoneFluoresence.title: Stone Fluorescence
stoneFluoresence.description: Closed List - Used to describe the color and strength of the UV light reflected off some diamonds.
stoneFluoresence.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The measurement of the height of the stone (vs. the setting) as measured the from the table (top of the stone) to the culet (bottom of the stone). Example: 6; 5.5

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The measurement of the height of the stone (vs. the setting) as measured the from the table (top of the stone) to the culet (bottom of the stone).

stoneHeight.title: Stone Height
stoneHeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The measurement of the height of the stone (vs. the setting) as measured the from the table (top of the stone) to the culet (bottom of the stone). Example: 6; 5.5
stoneHeight.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The measure of the largest dimensional side of a gemstone with the face pointing towards the observer. Example: 2.3; 5

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The measure of the largest dimensional side of a gemstone with the face pointing towards the observer.

stoneLength.title: Stone Length
stoneLength.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The measure of the largest dimensional side of a gemstone with the face pointing towards the observer. Example: 2.3; 5
stoneLength.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

stonePolish.title: Stone Polish
stonePolish.description: Closed List - Polish refers to the degree of smoothness of each facet of a gem as measured by a gemologist. When a gem is cut and polished, microscopic surface defects may be created by the polishing wheel as it drags tiny dislodged crystals across the gem's surface.
stonePolish.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - In a grading report, table percentage is calculated based on the size of the table divided by the average girdle diameter of the gem. So, a 60 percent table means that the table is 60 percent wide as the gem's outline. The Table Percentage refers to the width of the top part of the diamond (the Table) as a percentage of the total width of the diamond at its widest point (the girdle). The ideal proportions of a diamond is typically 53% to 58%.   Example: 53;58

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - In a grading report, table percentage is calculated based on the size of the table divided by the average girdle diameter of the gem. So, a 60 percent table means that the table is 60 percent wide as the gem's outline. The Table Percentage refers to the width of the top part of the diamond (the Table) as a percentage of the total width of the diamond at its widest point (the girdle). The ideal proportions of a diamond is typically 53% to 58%.

stoneTablePercentage.title: Stone Table Percentage
stoneTablePercentage.description: Decimal, 16 characters - In a grading report, table percentage is calculated based on the size of the table divided by the average girdle diameter of the gem. So, a 60 percent table means that the table is 60 percent wide as the gem's outline. The Table Percentage refers to the width of the top part of the diamond (the Table) as a percentage of the total width of the diamond at its widest point (the girdle). The ideal proportions of a diamond is typically 53% to 58%.   Example: 53;58
stoneTablePercentage.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

stoneTreatment.title: Stone Treatment
stoneTreatment.description: Closed List - Describes the process a gemstone has undergone to produce changes in the durability, color, and/or clarity that are beyond the typical gemstone conditioning.
stoneTreatment.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The measure of the narrower dimensional side of a gemstone with the face pointing towards the observer. Example: 2.3;6

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - The measure of the narrower dimensional side of a gemstone with the face pointing towards the observer.

stoneWidth.title: Stone Width
stoneWidth.description: Decimal, 16 characters - The measure of the narrower dimensional side of a gemstone with the face pointing towards the observer. Example: 2.3;6
stoneWidth.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Alphanumeric, 800 characters - A dominant idea, meaning, or setting applied to an item.  Example: Beach;New York City;Religious;Retro;Love;Be Kind;WWE
theme.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

thirdPartyAccreditationSymbolOnProductPa.description: Closed List - The code representing a symbol or marking third party accreditation on the product package.
thirdPartyAccreditationSymbolOnProductPa.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Total gemstone weight is the combined carat weight of all of the gemstones in a piece of jewelry. Paired earrings would be considered a single piece, therefore if each earring contained a gemstone with a carat weight of 1/2, the value entered would be 1 ct (2 x 1/2 ct).  This is a useful indication of gemstone sizes, provided the stones in question are of the same type.  Differing types have differing densities so the carat weight will not necessarily provide an accurate indication of size for comparison purposes. Example: 1.29;0.70

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - Total gemstone weight is the combined carat weight of all of the gemstones in a piece of jewelry. Paired earrings would be considered a single piece, therefore if each earring contained a gemstone with a carat weight of 1/2, the value entered would be 1 ct (2 x 1/2 ct).  This is a useful indication of gemstone sizes, provided the stones in question are of the same type.  Differing types have differing densities so the carat weight will not necessarily provide an accurate indication of size for comparison purposes.

totalGemWeight.title: Total Gemstone Weight
totalGemWeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Total gemstone weight is the combined carat weight of all of the gemstones in a piece of jewelry. Paired earrings would be considered a single piece, therefore if each earring contained a gemstone with a carat weight of 1/2, the value entered would be 1 ct (2 x 1/2 ct).  This is a useful indication of gemstone sizes, provided the stones in question are of the same type.  Differing types have differing densities so the carat weight will not necessarily provide an accurate indication of size for comparison purposes. Example: 1.29;0.70
totalGemWeight.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Total diamond weight is the combined carat weight of all the diamonds in a piece of jewelry.  Paired earrings would be considered a single piece, therefore if each earring contained a diamond with a carat weight of 1/2, the value entered would be 1 ct (2 x 1/2 ct).  Example: 1.29;0.70

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Closed List - Total diamond weight is the combined carat weight of all the diamonds in a piece of jewelry.  Paired earrings would be considered a single piece, therefore if each earring contained a diamond with a carat weight of 1/2, the value entered would be 1 ct (2 x 1/2 ct).

totalDiamondWeight.title: Total Stone Weight - Carats
totalDiamondWeight.description: Decimal, 16 characters - Total diamond weight is the combined carat weight of all the diamonds in a piece of jewelry.  Paired earrings would be considered a single piece, therefore if each earring contained a diamond with a carat weight of 1/2, the value entered would be 1 ct (2 x 1/2 ct).  Example: 1.29;0.70
totalDiamondWeight.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

warrantyText.title: Warranty Text
warrantyText.description: Alphanumeric, 20000 characters - Warranty Text (the full text of the warranty terms, including what is covered by the warranty and the duration of the warranty). NOTE: please remember to update the text of your warranty as your warranty changes. Example: This warranty covers any defects in materials or workmanship, including installation, with the exceptions of fading or discoloration caused by exposure to sunlight or chemicals. This warranty runs for five years from the date your carpet is installed. Counterpoint will either replace your carpet with new carpet of similar composition and price, or refund the full purchase price of your carpet, whichever you prefer. Contact Counterpoint at 800-867-5309.
examples: This warranty covers any defects in materials or workmanship, including installation, with the exceptions of fading or discoloration caused by exposure to sunlight or chemicals. This warranty runs for five years from the date your carpet is installed. Counterpoint will either replace your carpet with new carpet of similar composition and price, or refund the full purchase price of your carpet, whichever you prefer. Contact Counterpoint at 800-867-5309.
warrantyText.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

warrantyURL.title: Warranty URL
warrantyURL.description: URL, 2500 characters - The Warranty URL is the web location of the image, PDF, or link to the manufacturer's warranty page, showing the warranty and its terms, including the duration of the warranty. URLs must begin with http:// or https:// NOTE: Please remember to update the link and/or text of the warranty as the warranty changes. If supplying an image, provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required) and ends in a proper image extension. Recommended file type: JPEG Accepted file types: JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP Maximum file size: 5 MB. Example: http://www.walmart.com/warranty_info.pdf
warrantyURL.comments: @group=Recommended to improve search and browse on Walmart website

variantGroupId.title: Variant Group ID
variantGroupId.description: Alphanumeric, 300 characters - Required if item is a variant. Make up a number and/or letter code for "Variant Group ID" and add this to all variations of the same product. Partners must ensure uniqueness of their Variant Group IDs. Example: HANESV025
variantGroupId.comments: @group=Recommended to create a variant experience on Walmart website

variantAttributeNames.title: Variant Attribute Names
variantAttributeNames.description: Closed List - The designated attribute by which an item is varying.
variantAttributeNames.comments: @group=Recommended to create a variant experience on Walmart website

isPrimaryVariant.title: Is Primary Variant
isPrimaryVariant.description: Closed List - Note whether item is intended as the main variant in a variant grouping. The primary variant will appear as the image when customers search and the first image displayed on the item page. This should be set as "Yes" for only one item in a group of variants.
isPrimaryVariant.comments: @group=Recommended to create a variant experience on Walmart website

swatchImages.title: Swatch Images

swatchImageUrl.title: Swatch Image URL
swatchImageUrl.description: URL, 2500 characters - URL of the color or pattern swatch image. This is required for products with visual variations and will be shown as a small circle on the item page. File Format: JPEG (.jpg). Recommended Pixel Dimensions: 100px x 100px. Resolution: 300 ppi. Maximum file size: 5MB. Recommended File Naming: GTIN-14 digit. Provide the final destination image URL (no-redirects) that is publicly accessible (no username/password required.) Example: http://www.walmart.com/somepath/some-image.jpg

swatchVariantAttribute.title: Swatch Variant Attribute
swatchVariantAttribute.description: Closed List - Attribute name corresponding to the swatch.

swatchImages.description: Enter the swatch image location in "Swatch Image URL" and its corresponding variant attribute name in "Swatch Variant Attribute". Required for products with visual variations, like color or pattern. List the swatches in the order you recommend they appear on the site.
swatchImages.comments: @group=Recommended to create a variant experience on Walmart website
